keyMoments.title: Continues Fight Against Perona's Forces
keyMoments.description: Usopp battles Wild Zombies and animal zombies while withstanding Perona's Negative Hollow attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's unique immunity to Perona's most dangerous ability.
keyMoments.quote: No one can match me when it comes to being pessimistic!

keyMoments.title: Usopp's Negativity Affects the Ghosts
keyMoments.description: Usopp's overwhelming natural negativity causes Perona's Negative Hollows to become dispirited themselves, proving he is completely immune to their effects.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Usopp as Perona's natural counter and the only one who can defeat her, turning his weakness into strength.
keyMoments.quote: He's more negative than the negative ghost!

abilities.description: Usopp's extreme natural pessimism makes him completely immune to Perona's Negative Hollows and can even affect the ghosts themselves.

reveals.information: Usopp's overwhelming negativity makes him immune to Perona's depression-inducing ghosts

keyMoments.title: Continues Duel with Ryuma
keyMoments.description: Brook battles the zombie samurai Ryuma who possesses Brook's own shadow and uses his signature techniques against him.
keyMoments.significance: Brook confronts his own fighting style in a mirror match against a legendary samurai.

keyMoments.title: Protests Ryuma Using His Named Technique
keyMoments.description: Brook emotionally protests when Ryuma uses the Hanauta Sancho: Yahazu Giri, a technique named by Brook's old Rumbar Pirates comrades.
keyMoments.significance: Deeply personal moment highlighting the violation of identity theft through shadow stealing.
keyMoments.quote: You shouldn't use that name! That attack was named by my old comrades!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Ryuma
keyMoments.description: Brook is defeated by Ryuma's Arrow Notch Slash and collapses, thinking of Laboon and apologizing for his bad luck.
keyMoments.significance: Brook's defeat represents a low point but strengthens his resolve to reclaim his shadow.
keyMoments.quote: Laboon... I'm sorry for my bad luck and how lonely my life has been...

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Zoro and Franky
keyMoments.description: Just as Ryuma prepares to destroy Brook permanently, Zoro and Franky arrive to save him.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Zoro's confrontation with Ryuma and eventual acquisition of Shusui.

relationships.description: Brook thinks of Laboon while defeated, maintaining his emotional connection to the whale he promised to return to.

evolutionMoments.description: Brook thinks of Laboon and wishes to apologize to him while facing defeat against Ryuma.

keyMoments.title: Arrives to Save Brook
keyMoments.description: Zoro and Franky arrive just in time to save Brook from Ryuma, who was about to permanently destroy him.
keyMoments.significance: Zoro's timely arrival sets up his legendary confrontation with Ryuma.

keyMoments.title: Encounters Shusui - The Legendary Black Blade
keyMoments.description: Zoro learns about Shusui, one of the 21 legendary swords and a famed black blade wielded by the dragon-slaying samurai Ryuma.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Shusui foreshadows Zoro's connection to Wano Country and sets up major future plot developments.
keyMoments.quote: That settles it. I'm gonna beat you and take that sword as my own.

keyMoments.title: Challenges Ryuma
keyMoments.description: Zoro declares he will recover Brook's shadow and challenges the legendary samurai zombie to combat for possession of Shusui.
keyMoments.significance: Begins one of Zoro's most significant battles, facing a legend and claiming an iconic sword.
keyMoments.quote: I'll recover your shadow for you, Brook.

reveals.information: Zoro declares his intention to defeat Ryuma and claim the legendary black blade Shusui

keyMoments.title: Quadruple Negative Attack
keyMoments.description: Perona unleashes her enhanced Quadruple Negative Attack, summoning four Negative Hollows simultaneously against Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Perona's enhanced technique, though it proves ineffective against Usopp.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Her Natural Enemy
keyMoments.description: Perona discovers that Usopp's extreme negativity makes him completely immune to her Negative Hollows, making him her natural counter.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Usopp as the only person who can defeat Perona, setting up her eventual loss.

abilities.description: Perona summons four Negative Hollows simultaneously to attack with enhanced depression-inducing power.

reveals.information: Perona's Negative Hollows are ineffective against people who are already extremely negative

keyMoments.title: Uses Three-Verse Humming: Arrow Notch Slash
keyMoments.description: Ryuma uses Brook's signature technique, the Hanauta Sancho: Yahazu Giri, against its original owner.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the cruel irony of Brook's shadow being used against him with his own named techniques.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Brook
keyMoments.description: Ryuma's Arrow Notch Slash defeats Brook in their duel, proving his superiority in swordsmanship.
keyMoments.significance: Ryuma's victory demonstrates his legendary skill even as a zombie.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Shusui - The Black Blade
keyMoments.description: Ryuma reveals his legendary sword Shusui, one of the 21 great grade swords and a famed black blade.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the most significant swords in the series, a national treasure of Wano.
keyMoments.quote: One of the 21 legendary swords of the highest grade. A famed black blade with a reverse-waved temper line. It's known as the Clear Autumn Wind, Shusui.

reveals.information: Ryuma wields Shusui, one of the 21 legendary great grade swords and a black blade
Confirmed as the legendary samurai who slayed a dragon in the past

keyMoments.title: Plays with Thriller Bark's Rudder
keyMoments.description: Oars treats the massive island-ship like a toy, pulling on the rudder and causing dangerous ocean currents.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous combination of Oars' size with Luffy's playful personality.

keyMoments.title: Crushes All General Zombies
keyMoments.description: Oars instantly defeats all the General Zombies by dropping on them from above while mimicking Luffy's Gatling technique.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Oars' overwhelming power even without actual Devil Fruit stretching abilities.

reveals.information: Oars can mimic Luffy's fighting techniques without actually stretching, using only his size and strength

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Wedding Chapel
keyMoments.description: Sanji bursts into the wedding chapel declaring he has come to rescue Nami from the forced wedding with Absalom.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the rescue of Nami and sets up the battle between Sanji and Absalom.
keyMoments.quote: Nami! I've come to take you back!

keyMoments.title: Orders General Zombies to Stop Oars
keyMoments.description: Absalom orders all General Zombies to leave the wedding and stop Oars from destroying Thriller Bark.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the General Zombies' devastating defeat by Oars.

keyMoments.title: Horror at Oars' Power
keyMoments.description: Absalom is horrified to learn all the General Zombies were instantly defeated and worries Oars might sink the island.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the threat Oars poses even to Thriller Bark itself.

keyMoments.title: Arrives with Zoro to Save Brook
keyMoments.description: Franky accompanies Zoro to rescue Brook from Ryuma.
keyMoments.significance: Franky assists in saving Brook and witnesses Zoro's challenge to the legendary samurai.
